job_description: WHO WE ARE: As owner and operator of more than 60 per cent of Alberta's total electricity distribution network, FortisAlberta's focus is delivering safe and reliable electricity to more than half a million residential, farm and business customers. The Company serves more than 200 communities with 118,000 kilometres of distribution power lines across Alberta.‘Our promise is your power’ is FortisAlberta’s commitment. We are looking for people who can help deliver on our promise to customers. Working at FortisAlberta offers many challenging opportunities in both field and office environments. The power of YOU. At FortisAlberta we invest in our greatest resource – our people. FortisAlberta encourages and supports the health and well-being of employees because a healthy lifestyle touches all aspects of our employees’ lives. At FortisAlberta, safety is our top priority. We strive for ZERO preventable injuries through improving our safety culture and safety management systems. Employees will never be put in a position where safety is compromised.
